name: Wild Dimension
description:
Adventure seeker pilot decides to cross Pacific ocean with his private jet. While flying over the ocean he comes across a hurricane which was not mentioned in the weather forecast. Hurricane becomes more powerful each second and the plane get's sucked in. Pilot is struggling to control his plane and after some time losses consciousness when he hits his head against one of the panels inside plane. He falls with his plane for a while when finally he's thrown back to the ground...

    He wakes up the next day on a mysterious island. He's unable to locate the island on the map, and everything about the island seems a bit strange...  Will he survive the wilderness and reveal the secrets of the island? Will he be able to get back to civilization? Play the game to find out! 

Our team consists of 3 people. We started creating this peace of art after the Game Jam 2017 was started. It was a crazy month but we did it! Besides the job, the school and everything else we managed to come up with an idea and make it a reality! Hope you'll enjoy it! And of course, leave a feedback!

Source code available here: https://github.com/ArnisLielturks/GameOff2017-WildDimension

Follow us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/FrameSkippers
